page.title: 19A DAY IN THE LIFE...
page.content: of{Andrew Chandler. Along with some other{Young Christians from{St. Mark's Church,}I went to the{ {Diocesan Youth Day}at{St. Bees School. Prior to going we had to choose one or more interests for the day. There were plenty to choose from; golf, pottery, hairdressing and orienteering to name only a few. I chose to make a video. There were five in each group. We were allowed to handle the equipment and familiarise ourselves with the camera. After some experimenting and lots of discussion we spent the rest of an exciting day filming the other groups enjoying their tasks. I have been a{Cub Scout}for three years and have earned many badges. My proudest moment came in June this year when I received my{Gold Arrow award}at a district gathering. My picture appeared in the{Westmorland Gazette.
